page.title: 16Cafe survey at Prees Heath
page.content: To determine the favourite food eaten by passing travellers.We questioned travellers at the Raven Cafe,Breckland Cafe,the Midway Cafe and the Happy Eater.Out of the 36 surveys we compl- eted 14 were lorry drivers and 22 were daytrippers.The average price for a meal was about Â£3.36 .The favourite meal was sausage,egg and chips, followed by bacon,egg and chips,the third most popular was a bacon sand- wich with a large mug of tea.On average the lorry drivers go past 2-3 times a week.The furthest distance anyone was travelling was 250 miles the shortest was 3 miles.The busiest time for trippers was between 9-12 in the morning,lorry drivers 6-9am, 12-2pm and 6-8pm.
